warscrolls.name: Bloodpelt Hunter
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Unrelenting Hunter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is more than 9" from all enemy units, it can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Beast-breaker
abilities.effect: If the target is a **MONSTER**, the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Skullshatter** **Crossbow** is 3 and the **Damage** characteristic of its **Impaling** **Spear** is 6.

warscrolls.name: Butcher
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Savage Hunger
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly **GUTBUSTERS** units can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Firebelly
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor

abilities.name: Torrent of Flame
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Fire Breath** for attacks that target **INFANTRY**.

warscrolls.name: Frost Sabres
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Hunters of the Frozen Wilds
abilities.effect: This unit is not visible to enemy units while it is within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Frostlord on Stonehorn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stonehorn’s Rock-hard Horns** is 4.

abilities.name: Frost Spear
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** by attacks made with this unit’s **Frost Spear**, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of that enemy unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Earth-shattering Charge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll 2D6. This unit can move a distance up to the value of the roll. During that move, it can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Frostlord on Thundertusk
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Thundertusk’s Colossal Tusks** is 2.

abilities.name: Sweeping Tusks
abilities.phaseDetails: Once per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bellowing Voice
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick any number of friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can add 1 to the D3 roll made if that unit uses the ‘Trampling Charge’ ability this turn.

warscrolls.name: Gnoblar Scraplauncher
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Rhinox

abilities.name: Rain of Scrap
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any models slain this turn by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Load It Up!
abilities.effect: If this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Gnoblars** unit, this unit’s shooting attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Gnoblars
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes

abilities.name: Nasty Traps And Tricks
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit and that used a **MOVE** ability this turn to be the target. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Gorger Mawpack
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/5), Musician (1/5), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor

abilities.name: Frenzied Hunters
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **lurking on the fringes**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Troglodytic Lurkers
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **lurking on the fringes**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Gorlok Blackpowder
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor

abilities.name: Tiny Braggarts
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of this unit’s tokens that is on the battlefield and roll a dice. On a 1, remove that token from the battlefield. On a 2+, apply its effect for the rest of the turn:

***Peggz:*** The abilities of enemy artefacts of power that target this unit have no effect on this unit.

***Kagey:*** This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**.

***Mange:*** Each time an unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

***Shreek:*** Other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks that target this unit have no effect.

abilities.name: Blackpowder's Buccaneers
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Peggz**, **Kagey**, **Mange** and **Shreek** are tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place its tokens next to it.

warscrolls.name: Great Mawpot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes

abilities.name: Battlebroth
abilities.effect: If the **Great Mawpot** is full, **Heal (D3)** each friendly unit wholly within 18" of it. After you have done so, the **Great Mawpot** is **empty**.

abilities.name: Vessel of the Gulping God
abilities.declare: If the **Great Mawpot** is **full**, pick a friendly **OGOR WIZARD** within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the power level of the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Throw 'Em In
abilities.effect: If an enemy model is slain within 6" of the **Great Mawpot** when it is **empty**, it becomes **full**.

abilities.name: Great Mawpot
abilities.effect: The **Great Mawpot** is either **full** or **empty**. It starts the battle **full**.

warscrolls.name: Hrothgorn Mantrapper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Bushwakka's Trap
abilities.effect: The first time an enemy unit finishes a move within 1" of the objective or terrain feature with this unit’s **Bushwakka’s Trap** next to it, remove that **Bushwakka’s Trap** from the battlefield, then roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Gnoblar Minions
abilities.effect: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with this unit’s **Trap Launcher** while this unit’s **Bushwakka**, **Quiv** or **Luggit** and **Thwack** are on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove 1 of those tokens from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Hunting Beast
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Thrafnir** is on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 1, remove **Thrafnir** from the battlefield. On a 2+, place **Thrafnir** next to the target. Until the start of your next turn, the target is being **stalked by** **Thrafnir**. While a unit is being **stalked by Thrafnir**, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Trap Launcher** for attacks that target that unit.

abilities.name: Hrothgorn's Mantrappers
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Bushwakka**, **Bushwakka’s Trap**, **Quiv**, **Luggit** and **Thwack**, and **Thrafnir** are tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place all of its tokens except for its **Bushwakka’s Trap** next to it. Then, pick an objective or terrain feature and place its **Bushwakka’s** **Trap** next to it.

warscrolls.name: Huskard on Stonehorn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Priest (1), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stonehorn’s Rock-hard Horns** is 4.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Everwinter's Goad
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick each friendly and enemy **MONSTER** within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+:

• If the target is a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** unit, its **Companion** weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.
• If the target is an enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with its **Companion** weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Huskard on Thundertusk
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Priest (1), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Thundertusk’s Colossal Tusks** is 2.

abilities.name: Freezing Aura
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target had **STRIKE‑LAST** as a result of this ability in the previous turn. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Icebrow Hunter
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: The Hunt is On
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **outflanking the prey**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up each **Frost Sabres** unit that was set up **outflanking the prey** with this unit wholly within 12" of it and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Masters of Ambush
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **Frost Sabres** units if those units have not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up those units in reserve **outflanking the prey**. They have now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Icefall Yhetees
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Bounding Leaps
abilities.effect: This unit can move up to 3". It can move into combat.

warscrolls.name: Ironblaster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Rhinox, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Lethal Payload
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, pick either the **Big Shot** or **Hail Shot** weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its **Ironblaster** **Cannon**.

warscrolls.name: Ironguts
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/4), Standard Bearer (1/4), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Protect the Tyrant
abilities.effect: While this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly **Tyrants**, both this unit and those **Tyrants** have **WARD (6+)**.

abilities.name: Down to the Ironguts
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

warscrolls.name: Leadbelchers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Firing from the Belly
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a **MOVE** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Powder Gnoblars
abilities.effect: This unit has up to 2 **Powder Gnoblar** tokens. Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, for each of this unit’s **Powder Gnoblars** that are on the battlefield, you can re-roll 1 random characteristic roll for this unit’s Attacks characteristic. If a random characteristic roll re-rolled in this manner is 1, remove 1 of this unit’s **Powder Gnoblars** from the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Maneaters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor

abilities.name: Been There, Done That
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

warscrolls.name: Mantrapper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Just A Little Closer...
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Battle Round
abilities.declare: If any of this unit’s **Mantrapper accomplices** are next to this unit, pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place 1 of this unit’s **Mantrapper accomplices** next to the target.

abilities.name: Trapped!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Make a **trapped roll** of D6. Subtract 1 from the roll for each friendly **Mantrapper accomplice** next to the target.

If the roll is less than the target’s Save characteristic, until the start of your next turn:

• Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.
• The target does not have **FLY**.

abilities.name: Mantrapper's Accomplices
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Sabrefang**, **Gnoblars** and **Trap** are **Mantrapper accomplice** tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place all its tokens next to it.

If an enemy unit is destroyed or removed from the battlefield while any of this unit’s **Mantrapper accomplices** are next to it, remove those **Mantrapper accomplices** from the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Mawpit
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes

abilities.name: Feed the Maw
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Head Butcher, pick a friendly **Butcher** or **Slaughtermaster** within 3" of it and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Head Butcher (see ‘Altar of the Gulping God’).

abilities.name: Step Away From The Maw
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Head Butcher that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Head Butcher on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Head Butcher.

abilities.name: Throat of Ghur
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 12" of this terrain feature, or within 18" if it has a Head Butcher, to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. Add 1 to the roll if the target is more than 3" from all other enemy units. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Altar of the Gulping God
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Head Butcher:

• The Head Butcher cannot use **MOVE** abilities.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Head Butcher, measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the Head Butcher target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Head Butcher. Then, set up the Head Butcher on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Head Butcher. If it is not possible to set up the Head Butcher, it is slain.

warscrolls.name: Mournfang Pack
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/4), Standard Bearer (1/4), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Lumpen Wall of Flesh
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS** units while they are within this unit’s combat range.

abilities.name: Alpha Cavalry
abilities.effect: The **Charge (+1 Damage)** weapon ability has no effect on attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.name: Ogor Gluttons
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/6), Standard Bearer (1/6), Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Insatiable Gluttony
abilities.effect: If you have used the ‘Feast on Flesh’ ability this battle, add 1 to the control score of this unit for each model in this unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Gnoblar Scraplauncher
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Rhinox

melee.name: Rhinox’s Sharp Horns and Crew's Weapons

abilities.name: Scrap Away!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this phase by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn. In addition, on a 5+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Ironblaster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Rhinox, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Shrapnel Blast
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the phase:

• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s ranged weapons.
• This unit’s ranged weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

warscrolls.name: Slaughtermaster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Fill the Pot
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by a combat attack made by a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** unit wholly within 18" of this unit, give this unit a **grisly remains point**, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Great Cauldron
abilities.effect:
You can spend 1 or more of this unit’s **grisly remains points**. For each point spent, pick a friendly **GUTBUSTERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then pick 1 of the following effects:

***Bloodgruel:*** The target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

***Spinemarrow:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Stonehorn Beastriders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stonehorn’s Rock-hard Horns** is 4.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Stonehorn Avalanche
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, when this unit makes a pile-in move this phase, add D6" to the distance it can move.

warscrolls.name: Thundertusk Beastriders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Beastclaw Raiders

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Thundertusk’s Colossal Tusks** is 2.

abilities.name: Everwinter's Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn:

• If the target is a **MONSTER**, subtract 3 from its control score.
• If the target is a non-**MONSTER** unit, subtract 5 from its control score.

warscrolls.name: Tyrant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Ogor Mawtribes, Ogor, Gutbusters

abilities.name: Bully of the First Degree
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Brawlerguts
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the D3 roll made when this unit uses the ‘Trampling Charge’ ability.

rules.name: Feed Yer Cannons!
rules.effect: Ranged weapons used by friendly **Leadbelchers** and **Ironblaster** units have **Shoot in Combat** while they are within the combat range of a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES HERO.**

rules.name: Postprandial Warfare
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick up to D3 friendly **OGOR INFANTRY** units that were in combat this turn with an enemy unit that was destroyed this turn to be the targets.
rules.effect: Return 1 slain model to each target unit.

rules.name: Eyes of the Storm
rules.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS HEROES**.

rules.name: Fixated on Feeding
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Charge Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR INFANTRY** unit that is not in combat to be the target.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target can move a number of inches equal to the roll. It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat. If it ended that move in combat, the target has charged

rules.name: Master Butchers
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES WIZARDS**.

rules.name: Brutal Stock
rules.effect: Each time a friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS MONSTER** uses the ‘Trampling Charge’ ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any.

spells.name: Call of the Blizzard
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a terrain feature within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Place a **blizzard token** next to the target. Terrain features that have a **blizzard token** gain the ‘Obscuring’ terrain ability. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, until the start of your next turn, friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are within 3" of any terrain features that have **blizzard tokens**.

spells.name: Keening Gale
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES MONSTER** or **Mournfang Pack** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use a **RUN** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, you can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Pulverising Hailstorm
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of them, then pick each visible enemy unit within 3" of that point to be the targets. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the chanting roll was 8+, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

spells.name: Greasy Deluge
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Blood Feast
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OGOR INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Troggoth Guts
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** unit within 12" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: **Heal (D3)** the target and add 3 to the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: The Fang of Ghur
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: Gruesome Trophies
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks that target **HEROES** or **MONSTERS** made by friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Elixir of the Frostwyrm
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Shooting Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Flasks of Congealed Maw-juices
artefacts.effect: Friendly **Mawpits** within this unit’s combat range have **WARD** **(5+)**.

heroicTraits.name: Booming Roar
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy **INFANTRY** units while they are in combat with this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Touched by the Everwinter
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a **PRIEST**, it has **PRIEST (1)**. If this unit is already a **PRIEST**, you can re-roll chanting rolls of 1 for it instead. If this unit is a **WIZARD**, it cannot use **SPELL** abilities and **PRAYER** abilities in the same phase.

heroicTraits.name: Great Gutlord
heroicTraits.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to this unit’s control score and to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks.

heroicTraits.name: Prime Gutserver
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is a Head Butcher, gain 1 **tasty morsel**.

other.name: Gutslugger
other.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks if it did not charge in the same turn.

other.name: Megagobbler
other.effect:
Pick 1 of the following keywords:

• **INFANTRY**
• **CAVALRY**
• **MONSTER**
• **WAR MACHINE**
• **BEAST**

For the rest of the battle, each time any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit with that keyword by this unit’s combat attacks and that enemy unit is destroyed in the same turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons. This effect is cumulative.

other.name: Mage-swallower
other.effect: Subtract 1 from ward rolls for enemy units while they are within 6" of this unit.

battleTraits.name: Ravenous Brutes
battleTraits.effect: Add 2 to run rolls for friendly **OGOR** units while you have not used the ‘Feast on Flesh’ ability this battle.

battleTraits.name: Trampling Charge
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR** or **RHINOX** unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3. Add 2 to the roll if this unit is a **MONSTER.** On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Feast on Flesh
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **OGOR** unit that is in combat or that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:

• **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy unit in combat with the target. You cannot pick the same enemy unit more than once. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Driven By Starvation
battleTraits.effect: Friendly **Gorger Mawpack** units can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RUN** ability in the same turn unless they are wholly within 3" of a terrain feature.

battleTraits.name: Trampling Charge
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **ROVING MAW** unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Tasty Morsels
battleTraits.effect: Each time a model is slain by a friendly **Mawpit**’s ‘Throat of Ghur’ ability, you gain 1 **tasty morsel**.

battleTraits.name: Mawpits of Ghur
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.effect:
Roll 2D6 and add the number of **tasty morsels** you have to the roll. Apply the corresponding effect below for the rest of the battle round. Then, reset your **tasty morsels** to 0.

**2-3 – *Subdued*:**
No effect.

**4-5 – *Peckish*:**
Subtract 3 from the control scores of units that are **vulnerable to Mawpits**.

**6-8 – *Rumbling*:**
Roll a dice for each unit that is **vulnerable to Mawpits**. On a 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

**9-11 – *Famished*:**
Units that are **vulnerable to Mawpits** cannot use commands.

**12+ – *Ravenous*:**
Roll a D3 for each unit that is **vulnerable to Mawpits**. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: The Realm Hungers
battleTraits.effect: Units and **MANIFESTATIONS** are **vulnerable** **to Mawpits** while they are on the battlefield unless they are wholly within 1" of a terrain feature that is not a **Mawpit**. This ability has no effect on **ROVING MAW** units or units that have **FLY**.
